zh.meta_title: VaultCaddy - AI文檔處理平台 | 香港銀行對帳單、發票自動轉換

en.meta_title: VaultCaddy - AI Document Processing | Hong Kong Bank Statements & Invoice Automation
en.meta_description: AI document processing platform designed for Hong Kong accountants. Automatically convert bank statements and invoices to Excel/CSV/QuickBooks/Xero. 98% accuracy, save 90% time, from HKD $0.5 per page.
en.hero_title: Specialized in Hong Kong Bank Statement Processing
en.hero_desc: AI Document Processing Platform Designed for Accountants and Small Businesses
en.features_desc: Support for invoices, receipts, bank statements and various financial documents
en.section1_title:
Automatically Extract Invoice Data
Complete Classification in Seconds
en.section1_feature1_desc: Accurately extract merchants, dates, amounts, taxes and other key information
en.section1_feature2_desc: Automatically identify invoice types and categorize to corresponding accounting accounts
en.section1_feature3_desc: One-click export to QuickBooks, Xero and other mainstream platforms
en.section2_title:
Automatically Identify Transaction Categories
Generate Financial Reports Instantly
en.section2_feature1_desc: Automatically identify and categorize income, expenses, and transfers
en.section2_feature2_desc: Accurately extract dates, counterparty accounts, amounts and other key data
en.section2_feature3_desc: Support export to Excel, CSV, QuickBooks, Xero and more
en.why_choose_desc: Increase efficiency, reduce costs, focus on more valuable work
en.value1_desc:
Average **10 seconds** per document
Batch processing even faster
Save **90% manual input** time
en.value2_desc:
AI recognition accuracy up to **98%**
Auto-verify and correct errors
Significantly reduce human errors
en.value3_desc:
As low as **HKD 0.5** per page
No hidden fees
Pay as you go flexibility
en.pricing_subtitle: Join thousands of businesses saving time on financial data entry. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.
